reviewText: The voice actors who dubbed this obviously didn't know what the characters were saying, they just made up stuff on the fly. Yes, the dialog is funny at times.  However, this movie is about Wang Cong'er, a real-life Chinese heroine who became Supreme Commander of the Nine Armies of the White Lotus, and is the only movie about her I know of. Don't waste your money! Instead, buy the documentary produced by Lucy Lawless. More expensive, but you'll actually learn about this warrior. Google Wang Cong'er and you'll see what I mean.
